geometri.GeometricalForm

Uses of GeometricalForm in geometri
 

Classes in geometri that implement GeometricalForm
 class Circle
          A class describing a circle with a radius.
 class Line
          A class describing a line with an end point.
 class Point
          A class describing a single point.
 class Rectangle
          A class describing a rectangle.
 class Shape
          Abstract class for describing an arbitrary shape.
 class Square
          A class describing a square.
 

Methods in geometri with parameters of type GeometricalForm

          The method compareTo compares the area of the forms to decide if the given geometrical form is less or greater than this object.
